title: Water From The Well: Sarah, Rebekah, Rachel, and Leah
description: By retelling the stories of the Matriarchs through a sympathetic eye, Anne Roiphe will create portraits of the Bibleâ€™s women that will show how they played a role in Western history, how they taught us what is important and what is not, how they inspire our moral and immoral imaginations.
author: Anne Roiphe
